actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-853.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6837, to amend the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to authorize additional appropriations for the Northeast Corridor improvement project and to require the Secretary of Transportation to begin development of energy efficient rail passenger corridors, to provide for the protection of the employees of the Rock Island Railroad, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6837 (Rail Service appropriations and improvements).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6837, to amend the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 to authorize additional appropriations for the Northeast Corridor improvement project and to require the Secretary of Transportation to begin development of energy efficient rail passenger corridors, to provide for the protection of the employees of the Rock Island Railroad, and for other purposes.
